data.description: Full access to everything in the workspace/company
data.label: Owner

data.description: Can manage most things but cannot delete workspace/company
data.label: Admin

data.description: Can access and manage dashboard, financial, document, and invoice modules
data.label: Financial Manager

data.description: Can access and manage dashboard and payroll only
data.label: HR Manager

data.description: Can use all modules but cannot manage settings or users
data.label: User

data.description: Can access and manage documents only
data.label: Document Manager

data.description: Can only view data, cannot create or edit anything
data.label: Viewer
